CREATE TABLE event( eventID varchar(255) not null, customerName varchar(255) not null, type varchar(255), quantity varchar(255), hours varchar(255), location varchar(255) DEFAULT 'Indoor', time varchar(200) DEFAULT 'Day', description varchar(255),
primary key (eventID) )
insert into event (eventID, customerName, type, quantity, hours, location, time, description) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? ,?)
update event as e set e.customerName = ?, e.type = ?, e.quantity = ?, e.hours = ?, e.location = ?, e.time = ?, e.description = ? where e.eventID = ?
select e.eventID from event as e
